Page 53
Epstein Update
From Ray Ormond
To [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Sonya Thompson
Date 2019/07/24 10:56
Subject: Epstein Update
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf
Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney.
He has a pending incident report for Self-Mutilation and therefore, he will return to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and will be celled with inmate [b(6); (b)(7)(C)
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
he requested Protective Custody.
His case has been highly publicized and he is in SHU because
J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521-[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
Page 205
DOJ-OGR-00024693

From Ray Ormond

Date 2019/07/24 10:56
Subject: Epstein Update
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf

Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney.
He has a pending incident report for Self-Mutilation and therefore, he will return to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and will be celled with inmate [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
His case has been highly publicized and he is in SHU because

J. Ray Ormond

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, indicated by [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]. The document appears to be an email update regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody.
